conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true 3D cutaway with wall height/thickness, multi-face surfaces, and an angled/isometric-like view exposing interiors.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Clear 3D extrusion and cutaway; corners read as volumetric. Some simplification/oddities in interior partition geometry reduce confidence in faithful corner/wall detailing.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Major layout fidelity issues: plan shows 3 bedrooms + separate bath and WC + balcony + activity, but the 3D model appears to omit at least one bedroom and the separate WC, and the balcony/left-side outdoor geometry is not represented as in the plan. Room adjacencies and proportions appear significantly altered.

interior_elements.notes: Some furniture present (beds, sofa), but room assignment does not clearly match the plan; kitchen is absent, and bathroom/WC fixtures are incomplete relative to the 2D plan (separate WC not represented).

visual_clarity.notes: Clean render and readable walls/floors/openings; lighting is adequate. However, simplified geometry and ambiguous room delineation make plan-to-3D verification difficult.

detected_errors.description: At least one major room from the 2D plan (third bedroom and/or separate WC and balcony area) is missing or not clearly represented in the 3D model.
Room configuration/adjacency and relative proportions appear substantially different from the 2D plan (activity/balcony/bedroom placements do not align).
Door/window placements and opening orientations do not consistently correspond to the 2D plan.
Furniture/fixtures are incomplete relative to the plan (no kitchen; incomplete bath/WC fixture set; furniture-to-room mapping unclear).

summary: The second image is a genuine 3D cutaway, but it deviates heavily from the 2D plan with missing/unclear key rooms and mismatched layout geometry.
